Title: Accessing Keywords from the Community
Content: To access keywords from the community on MidJony, start by visiting the MidJony official website using Google Chrome. Once on the site, log in through the community login portal located at the bottom right corner. After logging in, you will be directed to your personal album where your artwork is stored. To view other users' artwork and their associated keywords, click on the button on the left side to access the public album. This album showcases popular works created by other users. To view the keywords for a specific piece of artwork, hover your mouse over the image. The keywords will be displayed, and you can copy them by clicking on the three dots above the image and selecting 'Copy.' This action will copy all the keywords, parameters, and URLs associated with the image. You can then paste these keywords into your MidJony software to create artwork with similar styles and themes. This method allows you to leverage the creativity and success of other users to enhance your own projects.

Title: Using the Public Channel to Find Keywords
Content: Another method to find keywords on MidJony is through the public channel. In the search bar, type 'info' to view account information. Then, click on 'Go to your thread' to be redirected to the community where you can view keywords. This method is similar to accessing the community through the official website but provides an alternative entry point. Once in the community, you can browse through various artworks and their associated keywords. This method is useful if you are already logged into the MidJony software and want a quick way to access the community without navigating through the website. By using the public channel, you can efficiently find and copy keywords to use in your own artwork, ensuring that you are always up-to-date with the latest trends and popular styles within the MidJony community.

Title: Copying and Using Keywords for Artwork
Content: Copying and using keywords from other users' artwork on MidJony can significantly enhance your creative process. To copy keywords, hover over the desired artwork in the public album and click on the three dots above the image. Select 'Copy' to copy all the keywords, parameters, and URLs associated with the image. This comprehensive copy ensures that you have all the necessary information to replicate the style and theme of the original artwork. Once copied, paste the keywords into your MidJony software and start creating your artwork. This method allows you to experiment with different styles and techniques without starting from scratch. Additionally, it provides a learning opportunity by analyzing how successful artworks are constructed. By regularly copying and using keywords from popular artworks, you can improve your skills and stay current with the latest trends in the MidJony community.
